name: Allagash Brewing Company
description: Founded in Portland, Maine, by Rob Tod, Allagash Brewing Company strives to make the best Belgian-inspired beers in the world. They are one of the 50 largest craft breweries in the U.S. by sales volume

name: Bissell Brothers Brewing Company
phone: (207) 400-2925 (from SAFER Web) or (207) 808-8258 (from Portland Old Port listing)
description: Known for its style-defining hoppy ales, Bissell Brothers has expanded to become a restaurant, sports bar, and event space. They are committed to brewing craft beer with high-quality local ingredients

name: Oxbow Brewing Company
address: Multiple locations: 274 Jones Woods Rd, Newcastle, ME 04553; 49 Washington Ave, Portland, ME 04101; 420 Main St, Oxford, ME 04270
description: An American farmhouse brewery specializing in Belgian-style farmhouse ales, saisons, Biere de Gardes, and mixed-fermentation beers

name: Kennebec River Brewery
description: Located at Northern Outdoors Adventure Resort, this brewery offers handcrafted ales and is featured on the Maine Beer Trail

name: Shipyard Brewing Company
description: A family-owned brewery established in 1994, known for its English-style ales and award-winning beers. It is described as Maine's Largest Microbrewery

name: Foundation Brewing Company
description: A production brewery in Portland, brewing a full spectrum of beers since 2014, with a focus on community and a pizza kitchen

name: Geary Brewing Company
description: New England's First Craft Brewery post-prohibition, incorporated in 1983, known for both heritage and contemporary beer styles

name: Sea Dog Brewing Company
address: Multiple locations, including 26 Front St, Bangor, ME 04401 and 1976 White Mountain Hwy, North Conway, NH 03860
description: A brewpub chain with locations in Maine, New Hampshire, and Florida, offering a variety of food and beers

name: Rupee Beer Company
address: Not explicitly stated as a brewery location, but brothers Van and Sumit Sharma are based in Maine
description: Founded by brothers of Indian heritage, Rupee Beer Company creates Indian-inspired beers designed to pair with spicy cuisine. They partnered with Alan Pugsley, co-founder of Shipyard Brewing

name: Cushnoc Brewing Company
description: Located in Augusta, ME, this brewery is mentioned in a regional listing
